); Testpage.getInitialProps = async function() { const res = await fetch('https://api.tvmaze.com/search/shows?q=batman'); const data = await res.json(); console.log(`Show data fetched. Count: ${data.length}`); return { shows: data.map(entry => entry.show) }; }; export default Testpage;
